text: Now it happened, as He was reclining at the table in his house,Matthew's—he evidently put on a big dinner and invited all his associates. that many tax collectors and sinners‘Tax collectors and sinners’ seems to have been almost a frozen idiom. A Jew who collected taxes for Rome was viewed as a traitor and held in very low esteem. joined Jesus and His disciples at the table; for there were many and they followed Him.
